Books.description:

Super-charged fan that creates a protective barrier of air.

Accessories.name: Tornado Fan+
Accessories.description:
[STR+50/DEF+50/Prevents Poison/Freeze]
Super-charged fan that creates a protective barrier of air.

Accessories.name: Vajra
Accessories.description:
[DEF+25/ADF+400/AGL+10/Prevents Seal/Mute]
A symbol of evil-purging in the East. Made of an alloy.

Accessories.name: Vajra+
Accessories.description:
[STR+50/DEF+50/ADF+800/AGL+10/Prevents Seal/Mute]
A symbol of evil-purging in the East. Made of an alloy.

Accessories.name: White Bracelet
Accessories.description:
[Prevents Blind]
A bangle that emits pure white light to prevent blindness.

Accessories.name: White Bracelet+
Accessories.description:
[ATS+100/MOV-1/Prevents Blind]
A bangle that emits pure white light to prevent blindness.

Meals.name: Amar Spiritus
Meals.description:
[Heals 5500HP/Cures K.O.]
A strong alcoholic drink used as a stimulant.

Meals.name: Amazing & Sparkling
Meals.description:
[Heals 14000HP/STR+20%/DEF+20%]
If the taste doesn't amaze, you probably aren't human.

Meals.name: Anarchy Soup
Meals.description:
[Heals 2300HP/Cures Faint/Sleep/Petrify]
A revolutionary dish using miso AND cheese. Lunacy!

Meals.name: Beastly Stew
Meals.description:
[Heals 12000HP/Restores 60CP]
A very filling stew. The more sinful, the better the taste.

Meals.name: Blood Extract
Meals.description:
[Heals all HP/Cures Ailments]
Blood from you-know-what. Makes you feel like a vampire.

Meals.name: Bloody Meatballs
Meals.description:
[STR3150/Line (Penetrate)/Causes Faint (100%)]
Meatballs that start bloody conflicts over their ownership.

Meals.name: Brain Roast
Meals.description:
[Heals 4000HP/Cures Sleep]
Coffee that's too bitter for its own good.

Meals.name: Cased-in-Jelly
Meals.description:
[Heals 13000HP/Cures Seal/Mute/Confuse]
Various raw ingredients solidified in jelly.

Meals.name: Castel Castella
Meals.description:
[Heals 5500HP/Cures Petrify]
An alcoholic confectionery item.

Meals.name: Crab Special
Meals.description:
[Heals 18000HP/DEF+20%]
High-class dish made using as much of a crab as possible.

Meals.name: Egg Salad Sandwich
Meals.description:
[Heals 1500HP]
Sandwiches made with boiled eggs and fresh salad.

Meals.name: Extra Spicy Fries
Meals.description:
[Heals 2000HP/Cures Freeze]
The spiciest fried potatoes one is likely to find.

Meals.name: Fish Skewers
Meals.description:
[Heals 14000HP/SPD+20%]
Fresh grilled fish skewers.

Meals.name: Fishy Finale
Meals.description:
[Heals 2500HP/Cures Faint/Sleep/Petrify]
The end of a migratory fish's long journey. To your plate.

Meals.name: Flower Milkshake
Meals.description:
[Heals 1600HP/Cures Poison/Blind/Freeze]
A creamy treat with a simple, gentle taste.

Meals.name: Fluffy Crepe
Meals.description:
[Heals 4300HP/MOV+1/SPD+10%]
A sweet, fluffy crepe that makes one's body and heart lighter.

Meals.name: Fragrant Juice
Meals.description:
[Heals 8000HP/STR+20%/DEF+20%]
Juice so fragrant, one can't help but sigh in wonder.

Meals.name: Freezing Meatballs
Meals.description:
[STR2550/Line (Penetrate)]
Meatballs so unpleasant-tasting, they freeze blood.

Meals.name: Fresh Water
Meals.description:
[Heals 2000HP/Cures K.O.]
Spring water filtered using tea leaves.

Meals.name: Fried Phoenix
Meals.description:
[Heals 4000HP/STR+20%]
Deep fried and dangerously spicy. Not made from phoenixes.

Meals.name: Fruity Temptation
Meals.description:
[Heals 12000HP/Cures Abnormal Status]
A tempting dessert that makes one feel younger.

Meals.name: Hot-Hot Potato Fry
Meals.description:
[Heals 400HP/Cures Freeze]
Golden tater skewers. Crispy outside, blazing hot inside.

Meals.name: Knockout Meatballs
Meals.description:
[STR900/Line (Penetrate)/Causes Faint (100%)]
A chili-packed ball of meat. One bite and lights out.

Meals.name: Miso Fish
Meals.description:
[Heals 5400HP/Cures Seal]
A fish dish complemented perfectly by miso sauce.

Meals.name: Napalm Meat
Meals.description:
[Heals 16000HP/DEF+20%]
Calcium-rich grilled dish where even the bones are edible.

Meals.name: Plate of Excellence
Meals.description:
[Heals 10000HP/Cures Faint/Sleep/Petrify]
A beautiful dish made more so by the white fish.

Meals.name: Queenly Cookie
Meals.description:
[STR1750/Area (S)]
Looks like a queen's crown and drives away the unworthy.

Meals.name: Repellent Dish
Meals.description:
[Heals 4100HP/DEF+10%]
A simple Eastern meal once used for driving off a youkai.

Meals.name: Septium Bullets
Meals.description:
[STR2850/Area (S)/Random Ailment (100%)]
Deadly food designed to resemble septium.

Meals.name: Septium Drops
Meals.description:
[STR1350/Area (S)/Random Ailment (50%)]
Strange candy. Effect varies by color.

Meals.name: Sludgy Cookie
Meals.description:
[STR2000/Area (S)/Causes Sleep (100%)]
Cookies surrounded by an unpleasant aura.

Meals.name: Spiral Grill
Meals.description:
[Heals 8200HP/Cures Faint/Sleep/Petrify]
A creative dish where the burned edges add to the taste.

Meals.name: Springed Egg
Meals.description:
[Heals 10000HP/Cures Poison/Blind/Freeze]
High-class eggs that have been slowly boiled in a spring.

Meals.name: Sweeeeet Crepe
Meals.description:
[Heals 1300HP/MOV+1/SPD+10%]
A saccharine dessert brimming with cream.

Meals.name: Swingwich
Meals.description:
[Heals 3000HP/Restores 50CP]
A sandwich the size of a bat. Swing and eat to gain energy.

Meals.name: Tasty Medicine
Meals.description:
[Heals 12000HP/Cures K.O.]
An edible Eastern medicine that can easily become poisonous.

Meals.name: Tomato Fondue
Meals.description:
[Heals 13000HP/Cures Poison/Blind/Freeze]
Tastes nothing short of exceptional. Goes well with bread.

Meals.name: Triplet Ice
Meals.description:
[Heals 8200HP/Restores 20CP]
A sweet ice cream made with three popular flavors.

Meals.name: UF Pie
Meals.description:
[Heals 8000HP/Cures Confuse]
A pie that can be thrown like a discus. Don't do that.

Meals.name: Ultima Ice Cream
Meals.description:
[Heals 2200HP/Restores 20CP]
The ultimate ice cream with three flavors singing in harmony.

Meals.name: Wobbly Rainbow
Meals.description:
[Heals 24000HP/Cures K.O.]
A bizarre dish that almost looks as though it's alive.

Healing.name: Celestial Balm
Healing.description:
[Cures K.O./Heals all HP]
A salve which cures K.O. and heals all HP.

Healing.name: Curia Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 100HP/Cures Ailments]
A salve which cures all status abnormalities except K.O.

Healing.name: Curia Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 2000HP/Cures Ailments]
A salve which cures all status abnormalities except K.O.

Healing.name: EP Charge
Healing.description:
[Restores 100EP]
An orbal energy-filled capsule.

Healing.name: EP Charge II
Healing.description:
[Restores 300EP]
An enhanced orbal energy-filled capsule.

Healing.name: EP Charge III
Healing.description:
[Restores 500EP]
An ultra-enhanced orbal energy-filled capsule.

Healing.name: Insulating Tape
Healing.description:
[Cures Mute]
Quick-fix tape to repair a neutralized orbment.

Healing.name: Purging Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 2000HP/Cures Poison/Seal/Blind]
A salve from the Septian Church to treat abnormalities.

Healing.name: Reviving Balm
Healing.description:
[Cures K.O./Heals 1000HP]
A salve which cures K.O. and heals 1000HP.

Healing.name: Smelling Salts
Healing.description:
[Heals 2000HP/Cures Confuse/Sleep/Faint]
A compound from the Septian Church to stimulate the senses.

Healing.name: Softening Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 2000HP/Cures Freeze/Petrify]
A salve from the Septian Church to repair movement.

Healing.name: S-Tablet
Healing.description:
[Cures Lowered Statuses/Heals 4000HP]
Pill that restores lowered statuses to their normal levels.

Healing.name: Tear All Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals all HP]
A healing salve formulated by the Septian Church.

Healing.name: Tear Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 2000HP]
A healing salve formulated by the Septian Church.

Healing.name: Tear Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 200HP]
A healing salve formulated by the Septian Church.

Healing.name: Teara Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 5000HP]
A healing salve formulated by the Septian Church.

Healing.name: Teara Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 2000HP]
A healing salve formulated by the Septian Church.

Healing.name: Tearal Balm
Healing.description:
[Heals 10000HP]
A healing salve formulated by the Septian Church.

Healing.name: Zeram Capsule
Healing.description:
[Cures K.O./Heals all HP/Restores 200CP]
A curative pill that revives and restores HP and CP.

Healing.name: Zeram Powder
Healing.description:
[Cures K.O./Heals all HP/Restores 100CP]
A mixture that revives and restores 100CP and all HP.

Items.name: B-01 Key
Items.description:
A key which opens a door on the second floor of the
barracks.

Items.name: Barracks Key
Items.description:
A key from Lieutenant Colonel Cid.
Unlocks the door to the barracks.

Items.name: Blue Cardkey
Items.description:
A cardkey found in the Lakeside Laboratory.
Has a blue line running across the surface.

Items.name: Bobcat's Key
Items.description: The Bobcat's key. Found in a storehouse in Grancel.

Items.name: C-01 Key
Items.description:
A key which opens a door on the first floor of the
command center.

Items.name: C-02 Key
Items.description:
A key which opens a door on the second floor of the
command center.

Items.name: C-03 Key
Items.description:
A key which opens a door on the third floor of the
command center.

Items.name: Chapel Key
Items.description: A key that was in Ries' pocket. Unlocks the chapel's door.

Items.name: Command Center Key
Items.description:
A key from Kanone Amalthea. 
Unlocks the door to the command center.

Items.name: Cube
Items.description:
An artifact salvaged from Valleria Lake.
Shows no signs of activity.

Items.name: Cube
Items.description:
An artifact salvaged from Valleria Lake.
Emits a faint glow.

Items.name: Cube
Items.description:
An artifact containing mysterious power. Can be used to
return instantly to the garden.

Items.name: Entrance Exam Results
Items.description:
A letter to Kloe Rinz informing her that she has passed
the Jenis Royal Academy entrance examination.

Items.name: Green Cardkey
Items.description:
A cardkey found in the Lakeside Laboratory.
Has a green line running across the surface.

Items.name: ID Card
Items.description: Level 1 ID card. Opens shutters somewhere.

Items.name: ID Card 2
Items.description: Level 2 ID card. Opens shutters somewhere.

Items.name: Red Cardkey
Items.description:
A cardkey found in the Lakeside Laboratory.
Has a red line running across the surface.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Sealing Stone
Items.description: A jewel that gives off a pulsating, mysterious light.

Items.name: Security Card
Items.description:
A security card from Gilbert.
Can be used to unlock the elevator leading to the hangar.

Items.name: Tournament Invitation
Items.description:
An invitation to a special, invite-only martial arts
tournament. Needed to participate in high-level matches.

Items.name: Treasury Key
Items.description: The key to Grancel Castle's treasury. Found on the terrace.

Items.name: Zemurian Ore
Items.description:
A mass of ore with a glittering countenance.
So hard that there's no clear way to process it.

Fishing Rods.name: Aqua Master
Fishing Rods.description:
Miraculous tackle believed to be of ancient Zemurian origin. A piece of gear any
fisher would trade their fortune for.

Fishing Rods.name: Bamboo Fishing Rod
Fishing Rods.description:
The most basic rod and tackle. Limits the usable types of bait, but can sometimes
catch surprisingly big fish.

Fishing Rods.name: Lakelord II
Fishing Rods.description:
Next-generation tackle for hardcore fishers. It can only be used in
certain areas, but it can handle the biggest fish.

Fishing Rods.name: Marine Star
Fishing Rods.description:
The standard tackle for saltwater fishing. A must-have for aspiring
fishermen and women.

Fishing Rods.name: Metal Rod Trident
Fishing Rods.description:
Heavy tackle created exclusively to catch big fish. A masterpiece of design in the
pursuit of giant fishy foes.

Fishing Rods.name: Piscis Heart
Fishing Rods.description:
Lightweight tackle made for delicate fishing work. The best set for fishing up
small to medium sized fish.

Fishing Rods.name: Progress Rod
Fishing Rods.description:
Average rod and tackle that can be used in a variety of locations. The standard
for the Fisherman's Guild.

Quartz.name: Absorb
Quartz.description: Recovers 2% of user's max HP when defeating an enemy.

Quartz.name: Cast 1
Quartz.description: Time to cast arts is cut.

Quartz.name: Cast 2
Quartz.description: Time to cast arts is greatly cut.

Quartz.name: Covert
Quartz.description: Combines the effects of Haze and Information.

Quartz.name: Detection
Quartz.description: Displays treasure chests locations on the minimap.

Quartz.name: Divine Eye
Quartz.description: Scent, Eagle Eye, Information, Septium Vein, Luck.

Quartz.name: Eagle Eye
Quartz.description: Can see enemies from a distance.

Quartz.name: Falcon Eye
Quartz.description: Displays enemy locations on the minimap.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Blind
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to blind any enemy. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Confuse
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to confuse any enemy. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Critical
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to deal critical damage. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Faint
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to faint any enemy. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Mute
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to mute any enemy. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Seal
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to seal any enemy. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Guaranteed Sleep
Quartz.description: ??Guaranteed to sleep any enemy. Debug use.

Quartz.name: Heaven's Eye
Quartz.description: Combines the effects of Eagle Eye and Information.

Quartz.name: Impede 1
Quartz.description: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 10% success rate.

Quartz.name: Impede 2
Quartz.description: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 15% success rate.

Quartz.name: Impede 3
Quartz.description: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 20% success rate.

Quartz.name: Impede 4
Quartz.description: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 25% success rate.

Quartz.name: Information
Quartz.description: Be able to perceive enemy status.

Quartz.name: Ingenuity
Quartz.description: Recovers a small amount of EP while walking.

Quartz.name: Ingenuity 2
Quartz.description: Recovers a small amount of EP while walking and in battle.

Quartz.name: Luck
Quartz.description: Increases enemies' item drop rate by 30%.

Quartz.name: Memory
Quartz.description: Door locations are shown on the minimap.

Quartz.name: Mirror
Quartz.description: Reflect physical damage with 50% success. Max HP-20%

Quartz.name: Nothingness
Quartz.description: Attacks inflict a random status ailment without fail.

Quartz.name: Physical
Quartz.description: Receives less physical damage, but more magic damage.

Quartz.name: Reflect
Quartz.description: Reflect magical damage with 50% success. EP-30%

Quartz.name: Septium Vein
Quartz.description: Increases all types of sepith dropped by monsters by 1~2.

Quartz.name: Sleep
Quartz.description: Put enemy to sleep with 10% success.

Quartz.name: Sleep 2
Quartz.description: Puts enemy to sleep with 20% success.

Quartz.name: Soul
Quartz.description: EP is automatically converted to CP during battle.

Quartz.name: Spiritual
Quartz.description: Receives less magic damage, but more physical damage.

Quartz.name: Wood Gem
Quartz.description: Prevent enemy arts and crafts with 30% success rate. (#92IImpede 5)

Quartz.name: Yin-Yang
Quartz.description: Combines the effects of Haze and Heal.

Ingredients.name: Acerbic Tomato
Ingredients.description:
A new species that arose as a byproduct of experimentation.
It is unimaginably bitter.

Ingredients.name: Aged Miso
Ingredients.description:
An Eastern seasoning made by fermenting steamed grains.
Has a pungent flavor and is great for health.

Ingredients.name: Azelia Fruit
Ingredients.description:
A fruit with a tough rind indigenous to the Ruan region.
It is mainly enjoyed in the form of juice.

Ingredients.name: Bear Claw
Ingredients.description:
A thorny medicinal herb that looks like a bear's claw.
Often used in food and medicine.

Ingredients.name: Beast Flesh
Ingredients.description:
Monster flesh with a slight odor.
The more you chew it, the better it tastes.

Ingredients.name: Bird Egg
Ingredients.description:
A giant egg the size of a child's head.
Prized in the East as a revitalizing agent.

Ingredients.name: Black Pepper
Ingredients.description:
Whole black pepper.
An essential spice in meat dishes.

Ingredients.name: Clear Gelatin
Ingredients.description:
A tasteless, scentless gelatinous strand.
It melts in the mouth like a smooth froth.

Ingredients.name: Crisp Onion
Ingredients.description:
A large onion with a nice, crunchy texture.
With almost no acrid taste, it can be eaten like an apple.

Ingredients.name: Curative Horn
Ingredients.description:
A health food full of minerals.
Figuring out how to eat it requires some ingenuity.

Ingredients.name: Dirty Carrot
Ingredients.description:
A sweet carrot great for cooking.
The dirt is used to keep it fresh.

Ingredients.name: Dragon Beans
Ingredients.description:
Flavorful coffee beans native to Liberl.
The raw beans are used as a condiment.

Ingredients.name: Firefly Fungus
Ingredients.description:
A suspiciously green, glowing mushroom.
It is rumored to be delectable if prepared right.

Ingredients.name: Fish Egg
Ingredients.description:
A fun food that pops in the mouth.
It is a popular ingredient in Eastern cooking.

Ingredients.name: Fish Fillet
Ingredients.description:
Fish with a rather sinewy texture.
It's quite tough to chew for being light white meat.

Ingredients.name: Flaky Potato
Ingredients.description:
A small, succulent potato.
Great in boiled foods since it keeps its firmness.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Eggs
Ingredients.description:
Newly laid eggs from free-range chickens.
A basic ingredient essential for cooking.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Herb
Ingredients.description:
A sweet herb with a pleasant fragrance.
Its use varies from tea to even ridding meats of odors.

Ingredients.name: Fresh Milk
Ingredients.description:
Freshly drawn milk delivered daily from the farm.
Rolent's local brand is said to be especially tasty.

Ingredients.name: Gummy Eyeball
Ingredients.description:
A large gelatinous ball of...meat.
A healthy food most people wouldn't poke with a stick.

Ingredients.name: Ironbone Fish
Ingredients.description:
A small fish with extremely tough bones. If the bones aren't
removed before eating, you've got a recipe for broken teeth.

Ingredients.name: Juicy Bone
Ingredients.description:
An essential ingredient for soup broth.
It is used in numerous dishes.

Ingredients.name: Kibbled Salt
Ingredients.description:
Coarsely ground rock salt.
Rich in minerals, it carries a profound flavor.

Ingredients.name: Leathery Tail
Ingredients.description:
A well-developed muscular tail.
Though troublesome to cook, it has an excellent flavor.

Ingredients.name: Lucky Fang
Ingredients.description:
A sharp, jagged, saw-like fang. Once ground into a fine
powder, it is used to spice up dishes.

Ingredients.name: Luscious Orange
Ingredients.description:
A hand-picked fruit from a farming village.
Vivid orange like the setting sun.

Ingredients.name: Maple Sugar
Ingredients.description:
A natural sweetener made from boiled-down tree sap.
Its faint aroma can be used as an accent for foods.

Ingredients.name: Marbled Steak
Ingredients.description:
A mouthwatering cut of meat that's tender and marbled with
fat. Great in dishes from stew to steak.

Ingredients.name: Milled Flour
Ingredients.description:
The most basic of ingredients.
Neither pasta nor bread can be made without it.

Ingredients.name: Monster Carapace
Ingredients.description:
The tender meat inside the shell is a real prize.
Being quite lean, the flesh has a light taste.

Ingredients.name: Olive Oil
Ingredients.description:
Oil taken from the olives of a tree laden with fruit.
Essential to give that special touch to dishes.

Ingredients.name: Prickly Seed
Ingredients.description:
A seed covered by a host of tiny thorns.
Sauteing it in a frying pan really brings out the flavor.

Ingredients.name: Red Pepper
Ingredients.description:
A discernibly red hot pepper.
Dried ones are often ground into powder.

Ingredients.name: Ripe Apple
Ingredients.description:
A succulent treat harvested after it has grown to maturity.
From the famous fruit orchards of the Village of Ravennue.

Ingredients.name: Royal Leaf
Ingredients.description:
A popular tree leaf used as an extract since old times.
It's even used to flavor candy.

Ingredients.name: Savory Pinion
Ingredients.description:
A thin, clear membranous wing.
It is mainly used to flavor dishes.

Ingredients.name: Sharp Cheese
Ingredients.description: Ripened cheese made from freshly drawn milk.

Ingredients.name: Tender Poultry
Ingredients.description:
Monster meat with a rather ordinary flavor. Its leanness
makes it a popular ingredient among women, however.

Ingredients.name: Tender Whitefish
Ingredients.description:
Delicate cuts of white fish flesh. Can be eaten grilled,
lightly seared, or (if fresh enough) raw.

Ingredients.name: Tri-Colored Rice
Ingredients.description:
A blend of red, yellow, and black husked rice.
Delightfully crunchy and often used in dishes in Liberl.

Ingredients.name: Vintage Wine
Ingredients.description:
A thoroughly aged, potent liquor.
It is highly regarded as a cooking wine for its rich aroma.

Fish.name: Blue Marlin
Fish.description:
Also called the Blue Noble. A fish
whose sea-colored scales glimmer like jewels.

Fish.name: Carp
Fish.description:
[Bait] A long-lived fish with great
vigor. Lives an average of 15-20 years.

Fish.name: Claudine
Fish.description:
A large fish with pitch-black
scales. Famous for its sequential hermaphroditism.

Fish.name: Crab
Fish.description:
[Bait] Crab that likes rock shadows. Used
as bait and will sometimes catch really big fish.

Fish.name: Dace
Fish.description:
[Bait] Small fish. Very tolerant to changes
in its environment. Found throughout Liberl.

Fish.name: Dumplings
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used for lakes and rivers. Made out of plants
and vegetables ground to powder, then molded into a paste.

Fish.name: Dynatrad
Fish.description:
A fish that has broken many
challengers before. The fabled King of Valleria Lake.

Fish.name: Earthworm
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used mainly for lakes and rivers. Squiggles and squirms grotesquely,
but fish love them.

Fish.name: Eel
Fish.description:
[Bait] A fish valued in the East for
imbuing vim and vigor into the consumer.

Fish.name: Frog
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used for lakes and rivers. Loved by aggressive
fish, but normal fish won't usually bite.

Fish.name: Garvelze
Fish.description:
Large fish that likes muddy water
bottoms. Also called the Lakebottom Brawler.

Fish.name: Gigangora
Fish.description:
A giant fish that inhabits the
bottom of Azelia Bay. Grotesque in appearance.

Fish.name: Gold Angelfish
Fish.description:
Small fish that inhabits the Azelia
Bay. Has a bright, blindingly gold body.

Fish.name: Granakor
Fish.description:
A gigantic crab over 2 arge in
length with both claws spread.

Fish.name: Great Blackfish
Fish.description:
Amongst fishers, this fish is
considered the standard for surf fishing.

Fish.name: Kasago
Fish.description:
[Bait] A fish that inhabits small, complex
areas like rocky waterbeds.

Fish.name: Liberl Carp
Fish.description:
River fish characterized by its
tiny beard. Found in just about all freshwater areas.

Fish.name: Mahi-mahi
Fish.description:
A monstrously large fish over
1.5 arge in length.

Fish.name: Octopus
Fish.description:
A mollusk that inhabits portions of
the Azelia Bay. Has a monstrous appearance.

Fish.name: Pearlglass
Fish.description:
Large freshwater fish with a body
that shines like silver. Calm and quiet.

Fish.name: Polychaete
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used for sea fishing. A worm that lives in the
coastal sand and other areas. Comes in a variety of sizes.

Fish.name: Rainbow Trout
Fish.description:
Medium-sized fish with
rainbow-streaked scales. Loves sepith.

Fish.name: Red Flies
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used for lakes and rivers. Insect larvae
painted red to stand out. Loved by small fish.

Fish.name: River Bug
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used mainly for lakes and rivers. They start under riverside rocks and
eventually grow wings.

Fish.name: River Snail
Fish.description:
Fishing bait used for lakes and rivers. A type of shelled
creature normally considered a pest by farmers.

Fish.name: Rockeater
Fish.description:
Medium-sized fish that hides in
the shadow of rocky overhangs. Extremely cautious.

Fish.name: Roe
Fish.description: Fishing bait used for lakes and rivers. Salmon eggs. Valued as food in the East.

Fish.name: Salmon
Fish.description:
[Bait] A river fish that swims upstream
during mating season.

Fish.name: Sea Bass
Fish.description:
[Bait] A fish that has multiple names as
it ages. Goes from Seib to a Sea Bass to a Sea Vic.

Fish.name: Shrimplet
Fish.description:
Fishing bait mostly used for sea fishing. Extremely easy to
handle, and attracts a variety of fish.

Fish.name: Snakehead
Fish.description:
Ferocious fish that prefers
stagnant water. Has an undulating gait.

Fish.name: Tiger Rockfish
Fish.description: A variety of rockfish. Has a beautiful orange abdomen.

Fish.name: Trout
Fish.description:
[Bait] A landlocked offshoot of the
salmon. Known for its tight, steel-blue flesh.

Fish.name: Valleria Bass
Fish.description:
Bad-tasting fish that inhabits the
lake bed. Eats everything and anything.

Fish.name: Yamany
Fish.description:
[Bait] Small river fish that loves clear
streams. Known for its spotted pattern.
